title: Where is Cash u (EUW)
body:
i want buy RP with CashU
but its removed !

replies.body:
can someone plz tell us wht happen with cashu problem we are middle east use cashu the most 80% of us
and i am using it and i just bough money on cashu for league and i cant buy cuz its not available with all my respect plzz help us

Looked into this, and I see that CashU has been removed as an option for EUW and EUNE.  There may be some other methods available per our [Payment Methods](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) guide.  Let me know if it helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XUo1fctW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-16T21:20:37.199+0000)
>
> Looked into this, and I see that CashU has been removed as an option for EUW and EUNE.  There may be some other methods available per our [Payment Methods](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) guide.  Let me know if it helps!

I need cash u 
because my money in cash u 
or if there any shop sell riot points give me there url plz

I don't really have visibility on CashU, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this with you individually and fine some options.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
any one help me how i can buy with Cashu now !
